modName: Convenient Skyforge and Wall of Honour
summary:
Just a small mod that adds a workbench and tanning rack to the Skforge, that doesn\'t interfere with NPC standing spots during Kodlak\'s funeral.

I also added a statue of Ysgramor and a Wall of Honour (with a little message) to the training yard out back of the Jorrvaskr.
descriptionHtml:
Just a small mod that adds a workbench and tanning rack to the Skforge, that doesn\'t interfere with NPC standing spots during a scene.

I also added a statue of Ysgramor and a Wall of Honour (with a little message) to the training yard out back of the Jorrvaskr.

Credits:
Skippy for suggesting ideas and encouraging me to make the mod :)
author: Deadarmour
